title: WIll I be illegible for season rewards
body: I was permanently banned in about May-ish for an oddball reason that I still to this day don't really understand (I was playing "trolly" picks in ranked but I still still trying my best to win, like Katarina Support), which I then submitted an Inquiry, later to have brought down to 2weeks via support ticket, which I am still grateful for. Will I still be illegible for season rewards for S6? I have not had any bans or restrictions since.

replies.body: We haven't made any announcements on our stance for season 6 ranked rewards.  Any details will be provided at our [news ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)page!  In the meantime, do your best to be a stand up summoner to your peers and feel free to reach out to them if you need any help through our [PB boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation).  Good luck!
